alerts.error_initialization:
An error has occurred while setting up the app database. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_fonts:
An error has occurred while loading fonts. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_db_saving:
An error has occurred while trying to save data. Ensure you have enough free space on your device. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_db_achievements:
An error has occurred while trying to update achievement progress. Ensure you have enough free space on your device. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_db_fetching:
An error has occurred while loading saved data from the database. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_db_processing:
An error has occurred while processing the data loaded from the database. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_db_erasing:
An error has occurred while erasing saved data from the database. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_permissions: An error has occurred regarding the app's access to required permissions. Change your device settings and try again later.
alerts.error_calling_not_supported: Calling not supported on this device
alerts.error_sms_not_supported: Sending text messsages not supported on this device
alerts.entry_delete_title: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
alerts.entry_delete_success: Selected entry has been successfully removed from your storage.
alerts.entry_delete_failure: There has been a problem deleting this entry. Try again later.
alerts.notification_failure: Could not set notification. Try again later.
alerts.notification_cancel: Daily notifications have been turned off.

instructions.tap_button_below: Tap the button below to proceed.

wrong_way.header_2: Sorry, there is currently nothing to see here.
wrong_way.body:
We're probably already on it and if you suspect we aren't, report a bug using the suitable button in settings menu. 

Thank you.
